sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GOODS_NMPR( GOODS_CODE , NMPR_SN , NMPR_CND , SETUP_AMOUNT , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DT ) VALUES( #GOODS_CODE# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(NMPR_SN), 0)+1 FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#) , #NMPR_CND# , REPLACE(#SETUP_AMOUNT#, ',', '') , 'N' , #WRITNG_ID# , SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS_NMPR SET CL_NM = #CL_NM# , FILE_CODE = #FILE_CODE# , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_GOODS_NMPR SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GOODS_CODE , NMPR_SN , NMPR_CND , SETUP_AMOUNT , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE# AND NMPR_SN = #NMPR_SN#

SELECT GOODS_CODE , NMPR_SN , NMPR_CND , SETUP_AMOUNT , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE# AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY NMPR_SN
